metadata.name: The Heart of Courage
metadata.description:
The Heart of Courage ♥️ Original Art series 

𝑀𝑎𝑘𝑒 𝐴𝑟𝑡 𝑛𝑜𝑡 𝑊𝑎𝑟! - 𝐶𝑜𝑙𝑙𝑒𝑐𝑡𝑖𝑜𝑛

-
The first owner of this NFT is eligible to redeem a 60x60cm / 23.6" x 23.6" - limited print edition of this painting
-

It takes courage to follow our hearts. It takes courage to stand up for what we believe in. It takes courage to say no to things that no longer serve us.

It seems like there are a lot of things trying to pull us away from our path.

But whatever happens, you do have the power to change the direction of your destiny.

The definition of courage is: the ability to do something that frightens one; bravery

That means to do something, despite the fear!

Whenever you feel afraid of something, remember "The Courageous Heart".

Courage is in you - you just have to use it, and it will grow stronger.

Lots of Love
Oliver
